feedinfo.name: Threat_Hunting_Feed_v2
feedinfo.summary: This feed is a collection of Threat Hunting starting points

reports.title: Connections from external addresses towards internal machine(s)
reports.description: Detected Connections from external addresses towards internal machine(s)

reports.title: Connections from internal machine towards external addresse(s)
reports.description: Detected Connections from internal machine towards external addresse(s)

reports.title: Connections of process that are hosting injected thread
reports.description: Detected Connections of process that are hosting injected thread

reports.title: External connections from/towards processes with listening connections
reports.description: Detected External connections from/towards processes with listening connections

values: (netconn_ipv4:[0.0.0.1 TO 9.255.255.255]  OR netconn_ipv4:[11.0.0.0 TO 127.0.0.0] OR netconn_ipv4:[127.0.0.2 TO 171.255.255.255] OR netconn_ipv4:[173.0.0.0 TO 191.255.255.255] OR netconn_ipv4:[193.0.0.0 TO 255.255.255.255]) AND netconn_inbound:true AND ttp:FIXED_PORT_LISTEN

reports.title: Hunt for mail connections offsite
reports.description: Detected mail connections offsite

values: (netconn_ipv4:[0.0.0.1 TO 9.255.255.255] OR netconn_ipv4:[11.0.0.0 TO 127.0.0.0] OR netconn_ipv4:[127.0.0.2 TO 171.255.255.255] OR netconn_ipv4:[173.0.0.0 TO 191.255.255.255] OR netconn_ipv4:[193.0.0.0 TO 255.255.255.255]) AND (netconn_port:587 OR netconn_port:25 OR netconn_domain:smtp* OR netconn_domain:*mail*)

reports.title: Hunt for strange DNS traffic
reports.description: Detected strange DNS traffic

reports.title: Processes that are not signed and verified, which have unresolved domain DNS lookups
reports.description: Detected Processes that are not signed and verified, which have unresolved domain DNS lookups

reports.title: Processes that have an unsigned image file, which have loaded modules that are floating code
reports.description: Detected Processes that have an unsigned image file, which have loaded modules that are floating code

values: process_publisher_state:FILE_SIGNATURE_STATE_NOT_SIGNED AND modload_count:[1 TO *] AND (ttp:INJECT_CODE OR ttp:HAS_INJECTED_CODE OR ttp:HAS_MALWARE_CODE)

reports.title: Hunt for processes that have an unsigned image file and have Shell with elevated privileges
reports.description: Detected processes that has an unsigned image file and Shell with elevated privileges

reports.title: Hunt for shell children of MS Office
reports.description: Detected MS Office with Command Shell

values: (process_name:cmd.exe OR process_name:powershell.exe) AND (parent_name:winword.exe OR parent_name:powerpnt.exe OR parent_name:excel.exe)

reports.title: Hunt for remote desktop control
reports.description: Detected Remote Desktop Usage

reports.title: Hunt for PSEXEC
reports.description: Detected PSEXEC Usage

reports.title: Hunt for firewall modifications and port forwarding
reports.description: Detected firewall modifications and port forwarding

reports.title: Hunt for binaries running from temp
reports.description: Detected Binaries running from temp

reports.title: Hunt for unknown unsigned binaries
reports.description: Detected Unknown unsigned binaries

reports.title: Hunt for registry keys in command lines
reports.description: Detected registry keys in command lines

values: (process_cmdline:HKEY OR process_cmdline:HKLM OR process_cmdline:HKU) AND process_name:cmd.exe

reports.title: Hunt for javascript in command lines
reports.description: Detected javascript in command lines

reports.title: Hunt for unsigned normally signed binaries
reports.description: Detected unsigned binaries that are usually signed

values: (process_name:explorer.exe~ OR process_name:svchost.exe~ OR process_name:powershell.exe~ OR process_name:lsass.exe~) AND process_publisher_state:FILE_SIGNATURE_STATE_NOT_SIGNED

reports.title: Hunt for binaries with dual extension
reports.description: Detected binaries with dual extension

reports.title: Hunt for processes with listening connections
reports.description: Detected processes with listening connections

reports.title: Hunt for children of Microsoft Office
reports.description: Detected children of Microsoft Office

values: (process_name:winword.exe OR process_name:powerpnt.exe OR process_name:excel.exe) AND childproc_count:[1 TO *]

reports.title: Hunt for privelege escalation attempts
reports.description: Detected privelege escalation attempts

values: (process_cmdline:"net user" OR process_cmdline:"/add" OR process_name:wce.exe OR process_cmdline:"net create" AND device_os:WINDOWS) OR ttp:PRIVILEGE_ESCALATE

reports.title: Hunt for uncommon RATs
reports.description: Detected uncommon RAT

values: ((parent_name:winword.exe AND childproc_name:cmd.exe AND filemod_name:"*\appdata\local\temp\qshlun\qshlun.exe" AND process_publisher_state:FILE_SIGNATURE_STATE_NOT_SIGNED) OR childproc_name:cmd.exe AND childproc_name:qshlun.exe AND process_publisher_state:FILE_SIGNATURE_STATE_NOT_SIGNED)
filemod_name:"C:\windows\*.exe" AND filemod_name:"C:\*.vbs" AND childproc_name:wscript.exe AND modload_publisher_state:FILE_SIGNATURE_STATE_NOT_SIGNED AND regmod_name:connectgroup

reports.title: Hunt for use of RDP
reports.description: Detected use of RDP

reports.title: Hunt for volume shadow copy deletes
reports.description: Detected volume shadow copy deletes

reports.title: Hunt for disabling of boot loader recovery
reports.description: Detected disabling of boot loader recovery

reports.title: Hunt for file sharing apps
reports.description: Detected file sharing apps

reports.title: Hunt for binaries downloaded from internet
reports.description: Detected binaries downloaded from internet

values: (process_name:iexplore.exe OR process_name:firefox.exe OR process_name:chrome.exe) AND filemod_name:*.exe

reports.title: Hunt for HTTP in command lines
reports.description: Detected HTTP in command lines

reports.title: Hunt for Base64 in command lines
reports.description: Detected Base64 in command lines

reports.title: Hunt for SVCHOST.exe without parent of SERVICES.exe
reports.description: Detected SVCHOST.exe without parent of SERVICES.exe

values: process_name:svchost.exe AND NOT parent_name:services.exe AND parent_name:*

reports.title: Hunt for hidden powershell
reports.description: Detected hidden powershell

reports.title: Hunt for Obfuscated powershell
reports.description: Detected Obfuscated powershell

reports.title: Hunt for Powershell download commands
reports.description: Detected Powershell download commands

reports.title: Hunt for encoded Powershell processes
reports.description: Detected encoded Powershell processes

values: process_name:powershell* AND (process_cmdline:*\^* OR process_cmdline:"-Enc" OR process_cmdline:"-NoP" OR process_cmdline:"-Exec" OR process_cmdline:"bypass" OR process_cmdline:"hidden" OR process_cmdline:"-EncodedCommand" OR process_cmdline:"IEX" OR process_cmdline:"Invoke-Expression")

reports.title: Hunt for unsigned unknown wmiprve system children
reports.description: Detected unsigned unknown wmiprvse system children

reports.title: Hunt for children of cscript and wscript
reports.description: Detected children of cscript and wscript

reports.title: Hunt for PowerShell in Services
reports.description: Detected PowerShell in Services

reports.title: Hunt for Windows Commandline spawning PowerShell
reports.description: Detected Windows Commandline spawning PowerShell

reports.title: All processes, which have image files that have executed from Temp Folder and not signed
reports.description: Detected Unsigned Binary executed from Temp

reports.title: Hunt for modified hosts files
reports.description: Detected modified hosts files

reports.title: Hunt for assets with an OS type of Linux
reports.description: Detected assets with an OS type of Linux

reports.title: Hunt for assets with an OS type of Windows
reports.description: Detected assets with an OS type of Windows

reports.title: Hunt for web related assets with services running apache, ngix, iis, tomcat
reports.description: Detected web related assets with services running apache, ngix, iis, tomcat

values: parent_name:nginx* OR parent_name:apache* OR parent_name:w3wp.exe OR parent_name:tomcat* OR parent_name:httpd*

reports.title: Hunt for database related assests with services running SQL, mongodb, etc
reports.description: Detected database related assests with services running SQL, mongodb, etc

reports.title: Hunt for email related assets running exchange, lotus, smtp, pop3, imap, etc
reports.description: Detected email related assets running exchange, lotus, smtp, pop3, imap, etc

values: (process_name:outlook.exe OR process_name:notes.exe) AND (netconn_port:25 OR netconn_port:110 OR netconn_port:143 OR netconn_port:465 OR netconn_port:587 OR netconn_port:993)

reports.title: High number of internal connections
reports.description: Detected high number of internal connections

values: netconn_count:[500 TO *] AND (netconn_ipv4:10.* OR netconn_ipv4:192.* OR netconn_ipv4:172.*)

reports.title: Absolute high number of internal outgoing embroyonic connections
reports.description: Detected high number of internal outgoing embroyonic connections

reports.title: Processes with autorun registry key
reports.description: Detected processes with autorun registry key

reports.title: Autostart services
reports.description: Detected autostart services

reports.title: Scheduled task executed from temp
reports.description: Detected Scheduled task executed from temp

values: process_name:temp\* AND parent_name:schtasks.exe OR parent_name:taskeng.exe OR parent_name:taskhostex.exe OR parent_name:Backgroundtaskhost.exe

reports.title: Changes to Startup windows folder
reports.description: Detected change to Startup windows folder

reports.title: External connections from/towards processes with listening connections
reports.description: Detected external connections from/towards processes with listening connections

reports.title: External connections from/towards injected processes
reports.description: Detected External connections from/towards injected processes

values: (netconn_ipv4:[0.0.0.1 TO 9.255.255.255]  OR netconn_ipv4:[11.0.0.0 TO 127.0.0.0] OR netconn_ipv4:[127.0.0.2 TO 171.255.255.255] OR netconn_ipv4:[173.0.0.0 TO 191.255.255.255] OR netconn_ipv4:[193.0.0.0 TO 255.255.255.255]) AND (ttp:COMPROMISED_PROCESS OR ttp:INJECT_CODE)

reports.title: External connections from processes hosting injected thread
reports.description: Detected External connections from processes hosting injected thread

reports.title: PSEXEC or Remote Execution
reports.description: Detected PSEXEC or Remote Execution

values: process_name:psexec.exe OR  process_name:rexec.exe OR  process_name:rcmd.exe OR  process_name:xcmd.exe

reports.title: Usage of RunAs command
reports.description: Detected usage of RunAs command

reports.title: Wmiprvse.exe executed by an unsigned parent process which is executed by SYSTEM user
reports.description: Detected Wmiprvse.exe by unsigned parent process executed by SYSTEM user

reports.title: Execution of unsigned child or grandchild by wmic.exe
reports.description: Execution of unsigned child or grandchild by wmic.exe

reports.title: Unsigned process which is a child of wmiprvse.exe and is executed with system
reports.description: Detected unsigned process which is a child of wmiprvse.exe and is executed with system

reports.title: Potential Pass the Ticket
reports.description: Detected potential Pass the Ticket
